title: Emotion Recognition and Visualization Strategies in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and online learning platform usage experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment utilizing learners' personal devices (BYOD), combining real-time online sessions with offline activities, requiring personalized feedback through learning analytics

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of emotion recognition technology and its educational applicability in online environments.
Learners can analyze peer learners' emotional states using emotion visualization tools and design empathetic interactions.
Learners can identify at least three ethical issues that may occur during emotion data collection and propose solutions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
